item.description: My name is Isaque Pimentel and I am currently a postdoctoral research associate at the Applied Mathematics Department at École polytechnique. I am working on stochastic control problems with applications to finance and economics. My research interests include option pricing and hedging with asymmetric risk and numerical methods for dynamic programming equations. I have a Ph.D. in Financial Mathematics from the CMAP at École polytechnique sponsored by a CIFRE contract with EDF R&D.
